releaseNotes:
With this update, we’re introducing two new features for you - “Courses” and “Insights”.
COURSES give you access to our library of interactive psychological exercises around the topics of rumination, self-worth and mindfulness. Month by month, we’ll be adding new exercises and courses to the library so that you will have a lot to explore.
INSIGHTS will replace the statistics tab in the main navigation and provide interesting and helpful information into your moods, thoughts, feelings and experiences. They should help you to better understand your thought patterns and triggers of depressive symptoms. Every Monday, there will be a weekly stats insight, summarizing your last week with all your entries in a nice overview.

We hope you’ll enjoy the update! Your Moodpath team.
description:
Do you struggle with some of your thoughts and feelings? Are you looking for ways to improve your emotional well-being? Moodpath is here as your personalized mental health companion. Try it out and find a place to reflect and get information, encouragement, and guidance.

FEATURES

1) Assess your mental health

- Answer daily questions about your emotional and physical well-being
- Get a bi-weekly mental health assessment
- Share your assessment with mental health professionals

2) Track and reflect

- Use Moodpath as your intelligent mood journal 
- Have a quick reference of your emotional states throughout the day
- Reflect on your thoughts, feelings, and experiences
- Receive helpful and supportive insights to understand patterns and triggers

3) Improve

- Choose from a large library of audio and written exercises, based on the methods of cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT)
- Understand the psychology behind your moods
- Improve your sleep
- Reduce brooding
- Learn effective mindfulness techniques
- Acquire skills in self-compassion

The subscription renews automatically unless turned off in Account Settings at least 24h before current period ends. Payment is charged to your iTunes account. Unused portion of the free trial is forfeited after purchase.

CONNECT WITH US

Web – https://www.moodpath.de/en/
Facebook – https://www.facebook.com/moodpathEN/
Twitter – https://twitter.com/moodpathapp
Mail - info@moodpath.de
